org.hps.analysis.ecal

Class SF2019Driver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.analysis.ecal.SF2019Driver

  • public class SF2019Driver
extends Driver
    This driver is used to check the Sampling Fraction correction for the 2019 run, using MC

      • getYpositionFromBeamGapEdge

        private double getYpositionFromBeamGapEdge(double xpos,
                                           double ypos)
        Return the y position relative to the beam gap edge, according to the 2015 analysis note convention.
        Parameters:
        xpos: - cluster position X coordinate mm
        ypos: - cluster position Y coordinate mm
        Returns:
        the distance wrt the beam gap, in mm
